name: GoldenVines
description: Golden Vines are sentient, plant-like creatures that grow throughout the Southern Kingdom's forests. They have thorny tendrils covered in small, golden flowers that emit a faint, sweet fragrance. These vines react to the presence of magic and are often used as traps or guardians by the Solaryn Fae.
abilities: Ensnare and immobilize their prey, draining their life force to sustain themselves.
Release a pollen cloud that induces drowsiness or paralysis when threatened.
danger_level: Low to medium. While not inherently aggressive, they are dangerous to those who wander too close or try to harm them.
